author: Carl_C_Icahn
content: 1/3 After last night’s debate I decided to accept @realDonaldTrump offer for Secretary of Treasury.

author: Carl_C_Icahn
content: 2/3 Seriously, the methods of electing our corporate and political leaders have become completely dysfunctional.

author: Carl_C_Icahn
content: 3/3  In both areas, we are in dire need of a breath of fresh air.
